settings.custom_price_note: Price includes frame, anti-scratch coating & UV protection.

settings.two_col_first:
• Vintage Sunclassics Folding Round Sunglasses.

• Timeless, Unisex folding rounded sunglasses. Perfect for that vintage look, your festival outfit, or daily wear.

• Polarized UV400 Lenses that blocks 100% of UVA and UVB rays

• Comes with a pocket-sized sunglasses case and a microfiber cleaning cloth.

• Made in Korea
settings.two_col_second:
• Classic folding sunglasses use tiny hinges on the nose bridge and temple arms to collapse into a small, packable square that won’t snap under pressure. This means you can throw them in your pocket or bag without worrying about breakage. Plus, the compact design makes them more convenient to store than traditional sunglasses.

• Every pair of sunglasses uses polarized lenses to minimize glare and the lenses also protect your eyes from harmful UVA + UVB rays. Lastly, these bad boys aren’t too heavy, weighing less than 20 grams, about the weight of a AA battery, so you don’t have to worry about uncomfortable and unsightly nose indentations.

• Pick up one of three color schemes to match your personal style.

settings.two_col_first:
SHIPPING

• Eyes Manila aims to deliver your orders within the next day for all Metro Manila locations and 7-12 business days Nationwide after every successful payment.

• Our delivery schedule runs from Mondays to Saturdays. Please remember that we do not deliver during Sundays and Holidays.

• We deliver same-day or next-day via Grab, Lalamove, Angkas, or Joyride. Payment for the delivery fee will be shouldered by the User.

• We offer a standard shipping option via LBC for provincial locations. Your orders will be delivered to your specified shipping address for a fixed delivery charge of only P250 for the rest of the Philippines. The delivery period for LBC-sent orders will depend on LBCs jurisdiction and schedule. A tracking no. will be provided to you for tracking and reference.

• Eyes Manila delivers Nationwide. Any order request with a shipping address located outside of the Philippines will not be fulfilled.

• Eyes Manila ships to the office address too. We will aim to deliver orders for shipping to office addresses from Monday to Friday between 9 am and 3 pm.

• Once your order has been packed and prepared, you will receive a Shipment Notification email to let you know that your package is about to leave our warehouse, indicating the estimated arrival date of your package.

• If you have specified a recipient who is not you for delivery purposes, then you accept that evidence of a signature by them (or at that delivery address) is evidence of delivery and fulfillment by Eyes Manila.

• Any guarantees made as to delivery times are subject to delays resulting from unforeseen events or force majeure.
settings.two_col_second:
REFUND

• All sales are final and no refund will be issued for completed and paid orders unless the order was canceled by Eyes Manila.

• For orders that were not processed or canceled by Eyes Manila, we will either not charge you, or refund you the total billed amount.

• The preceding actions shall be applied to the rightful person(s) in cases of fraud. Please review our Return and Exchange Policy posted on the Site before making any purchases
